titles: A motion to the East India Company by Thomas Smethwike (an adventurer with them) vpon the reasons following
author: Smethwike, Thomas.
notes: Place of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Proposal to reduce the time ships delay in India waiting for return cargo.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Trading companies --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
